meanings.definition: Not elevated in rank or position.
meanings.sent1: The humble farmer lived in an unexalted cottage.
meanings.sent2: The unexalted employee worked quietly in the background.
meanings.sent3: The unexalted squirrel tried to climb the giant tree but failed comically.
meanings.sent4: Her unexalted role in the play was like a shadow cast by the lead actor.
meanings.sent5: The unexalted mountain stood unnoticed amidst the grand peaks.

meanings.sent1: The unexalted student received no awards at the ceremony.
meanings.sent2: Her unexalted efforts went unnoticed by the teacher.
meanings.sent3: The unexalted cake was left untouched at the party.
meanings.sent4: His unexalted performance in the game disappointed his fans.
meanings.sent5: The unexalted painting gathered dust in the corner of the gallery.

meanings.definition: Not exalted in status or importance.
meanings.sent1: The unexalted position offered little room for advancement.
meanings.sent2: Her unexalted opinion was quickly dismissed by the group.
meanings.sent3: The unexalted coin rolled under the couch, unnoticed by everyone.
meanings.sent4: His unexalted presence at the event went unnoticed by the guests.
meanings.sent5: The unexalted flower wilted in the shade, overshadowed by the vibrant blooms.
